Articles.Content:
Hello, 

I just installed Parallax 2.0 and Kopernicus just like in the installation guide, but there is a Kopernicus error that says it´s not recommended to load your saved world... 

I tried the troubleshooting guide on github and reinstalled the game but there still is the error...

Hello, 

I just installed Parallax 2.0 and Kopernicus just like in the installation guide, but there is a Kopernicus error that says it´s not recommended to load your saved world... 

I tried the troubleshooting guide on github and reinstalled the game but there still is the error...
@bennilight, your cross posted topics have been merged and moved to Tech support sub.
Can you provide a copy of the log file so we can take a look at the error please?
